bio.title: Bio
bio.paragraph1: MÃ©todo Cicatriz is an artistic practice that explores the intersection between scientific observation and creative expression.
bio.paragraph2: Through detailed studies of natural patterns and phenomena, this methodology seeks to understand the underlying structures that govern both artistic and scientific inquiry.
bio.paragraph3: The work focuses on the documentation and interpretation of natural forms, creating a dialogue between empirical observation and aesthetic representation.
